title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Niners Camp Notes, OC Patricia w/ John Middlekauff, Fake Q’s on Jimmy G → Browns (?)
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Niners Camp Notes, OC Patricia w/ John Middlekauff, Fake Q’s on Jimmy G → Browns (?)
description:
First, Fake Questions, Real Answers (3:00), including if Antonio Brown’s latest bizarre statement is his most bizarre yet, which 2 QB/Coach combos are most likely to implode, the biggest mistake football fans make in August, which 2nd year QB will pop, how Trump changed college football for the better, and if Jimmy G to the Browns would be a good fit.

Colin and 3 and Out podcast Host John Middlekauff discuss if who’s to blame for the current state of the Giants (11:00), if they should bottom out or sign Jimmy G (14:00), his impressions of Trey Lance at Niners camp (21:00), if Belichick’s weird offseason decisions - including naming Matt Patricia OC - are as bad as they look from the outside (25:00), and which teams John thinks could be the biggest disappointments (32:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
